item.title: Thinking about smart home power usage
item.description: I’ve spent a great deal of my life admiring nature and thinking of ways we can do to reduce our footprint. I’d like to think I’ve taken steps both physically and monetarily to do so. Disclaimer: I’ve not been paid to review or recommend any of the products discussed below. The linked products may contain a referral link to help support my green adventures! The Dreaded Power Bill Which is why one Wisconsin Winter day I opened my utility (gas and electric) bill and had a not so pleasant moment.
